entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse Internal RNC polling shown to Trump: Voters in swing states have negative views on Trump & coronavirus. 
54% say he was too slow to respond
52% said the government should be doing more. 
37% say country is heading in the right direction, a huge drop: https://t.co/a27YG7g3eV
